name: sentient-beings dev container
postCreateCommand: echo 'Starting post-create commands' && chown -R $(id -u):$(id -g) /home/sentient-beings && echo 'Ownership changed' && chmod +x /home/sentient-beings/mnt/util/container_scripts/build_install.sh && echo 'Permissions set' && /home/sentient-beings/mnt/util/container_scripts/build_install.sh && echo 'build_install.sh executed' && echo 'source /home//mnt/ws/install/setup.bash;export PATH=$PATH:/home//mnt/util/container_scripts/' >> /home/sentient-beings/.bashrc && echo 'Post-create commands completed'
